about_the_game:
meatshot
noun  /ˈmiːt.ʃɒt/

A shotgun or scattergun shot where all projectiles hit the target, often occurring at very close or point-blank range. Defined by TF2 “carnage”

In MEATSHOT, you are the legendary Headless Horseman reborn, a fearsome beast with a flaming pumpkin head, unleashed into a brutal digital world. Armed with high-powered weapons and inhuman abilities, you are an unstoppable force, carving through enemies with speed and fury.

Pull off insane slow-mo flips and dives straight out of an action movie, shooting bullets mid-air. Leap from rooftops to crush enemies beneath your feet and skate on their dead bodies. MEATSHOT is pure action, where every battle is a high-octane dance of bullets, speed, and precision, where you control the flow of time and devastation.

content_descriptors.notes: The player engages in battles and kills enemies using various weapons, featuring blood and graphic combat.

detailed_description:
DISCORD


About the Game

meatshot
noun  /ˈmiːt.ʃɒt/

A shotgun or scattergun shot where all projectiles hit the target, often occurring at very close or point-blank range. Defined by TF2 “carnage”

In MEATSHOT, you are the legendary Headless Horseman reborn, a fearsome beast with a flaming pumpkin head, unleashed into a brutal digital world. Armed with high-powered weapons and inhuman abilities, you are an unstoppable force, carving through enemies with speed and fury.

Pull off insane slow-mo flips and dives straight out of an action movie, shooting bullets mid-air. Leap from rooftops to crush enemies beneath your feet and skate on their dead bodies. MEATSHOT is pure action, where every battle is a high-octane dance of bullets, speed, and precision, where you control the flow of time and devastation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 Max
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M2 Max
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: MEATSHOT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: MEATSHOT is a gory, action-packed shooter where you embody an unstoppable beast in a digital realm. Run along walls, dodge bullets, and pull off acrobatic gunfights in slow motion with pinpoint accuracy as you unleash carnage, taking down elite soldiers.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
